page.title: 10Our house Continued
page.content: their clothes in a wardrobe. There are two beds in there. Next to their room is Dawn and my room. It is the same as their room.It has two beds, a dressing table,and a wardrobe. We have got peach coloured wallpaper. Next door is my mum and dad's room which again is very similar. We have also got a bathroom upstairs where you can have a wash or a bath. We have got a Vic-20 computer with a 3k and 18k memory. Our house is heated with water filled radiaters.The water is heated by a back-boiler using coal. We have a car.It is a Ford Cortina. My front garden is nice.It has a tree near our wall.There is a nice lawn with lovely flowers.In our back garden there is a lawn.
